HEAD.title: Pennsylvania Spatial Data Access | Full Metadata

DL.DT: Originator:David Homans, Pennsylvania Natural Heritage Program

DIV.PRE: All Streams of 4th order or greater in the region surrounding data in the Pennsylvania Aquatic Database (PAD) developed by the Pennsylvania Natural Heritage Program (PNHP).
For reference in the development of the Pennyslvania Aquatic Community Classification.

By acceptance of this data, the user agrees to include a copy of this metadata record, including the liability disclaimer, whenever the user transmits or provides the GIS Data(or any portion of it) to another user.

DL.DT: Contact_Organization:Pennsylvania Natural Heritage Program (Western Pennsylvania Conservancy)

DL.DD: Microsoft Windows 2000 Version 5.2 (Build 3790) Service Pack 2; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.3000

DIV.PRE: Not all streams are named. Several other fields are incomplete.

DL.DD: Shapefile of compiled EPA RF3 files, having underwent a number of tools for atribute modification, and with river islands removed.

DIV.PRE: Latitude and Longitude listing per site (DMS)
All River reaches with a stream order of 3 or less were deleted from the original finalarlrf3 dataset

DL.DD: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

DIV.PRE: River Mile of T node or reach
Length of river reach in M
Proper name of inflow at T node of reach
Unique ID for river reach segment in the form HUC 8 number (sans leading 0); stream number; segment rivermile

DL.DD: Unique ID for river reach segment in the form HUC 8 number (sans leading 0); stream number; segment rivermile

DIV.PRE: Square miles of drainage area for reach segment
gradient of stream (F node elevation(m) - T node elevation(m))/reach length(m))
Average reach elevation(m); T node elevation + F node elevation / 2
From node elevation (upstream point) in meters

DL.DD: From node elevation (upstream point) in meters

DIV.PRE: T node elevation (downstream point) in meters

DL.DD: T node elevation (downstream point) in meters

DIV.PRE: Strahler stream order of reach segment
Number of upstream linkages at F node

DL.DD: Number of upstream linkages at F node

DIV.PRE: Number of upstream linkages at T node

DL.DD: Number of upstream linkages at T node

DIV.PRE: Arbolate Sum (number of upstream river miles)

DL.DD: Arbolate Sum (number of upstream river miles)

DIV.PRE: Number of road crossings on reach

DL.DD: Number of road crossings on reach

DIV.PRE: Storage of dams on reach (unknown units)

DL.DD: Storage of dams on reach (unknown units)

DIV.PRE: number of point source pollution sites along reach

DL.DD: number of point source pollution sites along reach

DIV.PRE: total number of upstream point source pollution sites

DL.DD: total number of upstream point source pollution sites

DIV.PRE: Attributes include stream names and many statistics specific to each stream reach.
